name: kartuli
description: Learn Georgian. No account needed. Free forever. Works offline.

scripts.c:e2e:game-client: BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000 pnpm --filter @kartuli/e2e exec playwright test tests/game-client
scripts.c:e2e:backoffice-client: BASE_URL=http://localhost:3001 pnpm --filter @kartuli/e2e exec playwright test tests/backoffice-client
scripts.c:e2e:storybook: BASE_URL=http://localhost:6006 pnpm --filter @kartuli/e2e exec playwright test tests/storybook
scripts.c:e2e:web-docs-client: BASE_URL=http://localhost:4173 pnpm --filter @kartuli/e2e exec playwright test tests/web-docs-client
scripts.affected:pr: git fetch origin main 2>/dev/null; pnpm exec turbo run build --dry=json --affected 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.tasks[]? | .package' | sort -u
scripts.affected:prod: TURBO_SCM_BASE=$(git rev-parse HEAD^) pnpm exec turbo run build --dry=json --affected 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.tasks[]? | .package' | sort -u
scripts.prepare: git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1 && lefthook install || echo 'Skipping lefthook install (not in git repo)'
